text: Ne tsingamia ( tsingâ€™ombe nende tsimbusi nende amakoondi keshihanwa) khwabakholela okhuba ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye , khubio mulimwo nende obulayi obunji. Kho murumbule elira lia Nyasaye olwa biemanga olunyaali (okhusinzwa) ne olwa bikwitsanga nolubafu, mulie khubio ne mulisie abakhayi basabanga nende balia babeyabeyanga nibalasaba tawe. Ne endio nilwakhwabakholela Abandu okhubawulila kho munyoole okhupa orio
